text:
Hi,

I am not sure where to put this bug, as there is no option to put bug for the
Axis project. so i am choosing this and posting it here.

The problem i face is, when i use the EJB3 with the Jboss 4.0.2 V, i try to
access the Bean from the client program using the Soap, but it throws AxisFault
error in the Jboss log, saying that it is not able to find the Beand which was
mentioned.

But when i created the WSDL file using the AdminClient, it generates the proper
WSDL file with all the function signatures and their types, etc.

so it would be greatfult ot have some help on this, first whether is the problem
is related with EJb 3 or what is the reason for the problem.

Thanks & Regards,

Deiva
creator: deiva@qxsystems.com
jan@materne.de
text:
Axis uses JIRA for BugReports
http://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/AXIS

Because this has nothing to do with Ant I close the bug.
